mapper.select: SELECT rcv_time FROM device_alarm WHERE device_sn = #{deviceSn} ORDER BY rcv_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ala.alarm_type AS alarmType, COUNT(1) AS alarmCount FROM device_alarm ala WHERE device_sn IN (SELECT dev.`device_sn` FROM car_device dev LEFT JOIN car_info car ON car.`id`=dev.`car_id` AND car.`etp_id`=#{etpId}) AND ala.`sta_time`>=#{date} AND ala.`is_del`=0 GROUP BY ala.`alarm_type`

SELECT a.area_name AS areaName1, b.area_name AS areaName2, c.area_name AS areaName3, a.area_code AS areaCode1, b.area_code AS areaCode2, c.area_code AS areaCode3, a.area_type AS areaType1, b.area_type AS areaType2, c.area_type AS areaType3 FROM `driver_map_sys_area` a INNER JOIN driver_map_sys_area b ON b.parent_code = a.area_code INNER JOIN driver_map_sys_area c ON c.parent_code = b.area_code UNION SELECT a.area_name AS areaName1, b.area_name AS areaName2, case a.area_name when "香港特别行政区" OR "香港特别行政区" then NULL else a.area_name end AS areaName3, a.area_code AS areaCode1, b.area_code AS areaCode2, case a.area_code when "810000" then NULL when "820000" then NULL else a.area_code end AS areaCode3, a.area_type AS areaType1, b.area_type AS areaType2, case a.area_type when "1" OR "1" then NULL else a.area_type end AS areaType3 FROM `driver_map_sys_area` a right JOIN driver_map_sys_area b ON b.parent_code = a.area_code WHERE a.area_name ="香港特别行政区" or a.area_name = "澳门特别行政区" UNION SELECT a.area_name AS areaName1, case a.area_name when "台湾省" OR "台湾省" then NULL else a.area_name end AS areaName2, case a.area_name when "台湾省" OR "台湾省" then NULL else a.area_name end AS areaName3, a.area_code AS areaCode1, case a.area_code when "710000" then NULL else a.area_code end AS areaCode2, case a.area_code when "710000" then NULL else a.area_code end AS areaCode3, a.area_type AS areaType1, case a.area_type when "1" OR "1" then NULL else a.area_type end AS areaType2, case a.area_type when "1" OR "1" then NULL else a.area_type end AS areaType3 FROM `driver_map_sys_area` a where a.area_name ="台湾省"
